sourcing.instructions: Silver can be sourced from precious metal suppliers or online retailers. Ruthenium can be obtained from specialized chemical suppliers. Thulium and Yttrium can be purchased from rare earth element suppliers or chemical supply companies.
steps: Silver can be sourced from precious metal suppliers or online retailers. Ruthenium can be obtained from specialized chemical suppliers. Thulium and Yttrium can be purchased from rare earth element suppliers or chemical supply companies.
1. Measure 600 grams of Silver (Ag) accurately using a digital scale.
preparation.raw_text: 1. Measure 600 grams of Silver (Ag) accurately using a digital scale.

steps: 1. After 4 hours, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool naturally to room temperature.
cooling.raw_text: 1. After 4 hours, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool naturally to room temperature.

steps: 1. Remove the solid sample from the crucible and inspect for any surface imperfections.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Remove the solid sample from the crucible and inspect for any surface imperfections.
